janaya nogawasunu diyaththak langata gos jalayata basa kalisama galawa eya soda gan iwure ela eya awwen wiyali yana thuru snanaya kirima ya.snanaya awasana wanna ha ma, anduma da wiyali kelawara wuyen, eya anda gena madiriya bala eema mage siritha wiya.kalak mese yana ena wita, hinehi handi kalisamath dirapath wannata patan gatha.aluthin amuthuwen andumak masa gannata mudalakuth atha mita natha.rajathuman wisin sapayanu labuwe aahara panadiya pamanaki.wili wasa gatha yuthu ya.ee sandaha redipili gatha yuthuya.mama kalpana kalemi.digin digatama kalpana kalemi.kalpana kota mebandu upakramayakin mudal soya gannata sitha gathimi.
